videos.title: Blender Product Visualization, Part 1: Modeling
videos.description:
Let's do some Blender modeling for product design and visualization! In this tutorial series, we will cover a full product visualization workflow, from modeling all the way to final render.

Downlaod the reference images from my Patreon (support me if you want!) and also follow me on IG!! Happy Blendering : )

https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D
https://www.instagram.com/nickel_3d

videos.title: Blender Product Visualization Tutorial, Part 2: Materials and Texturing
videos.description:
In this video, we will do some Blender product design with Part 2, Materials and Texturing! We will talk about UV Mapping as well as where I get my textures from for my renders. Grab the 3D Model to follow along for free at my Patreon, and follow me on IG for more! Happy Blendering!!!

https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D
https://www.instagram.com/nickel_3d

#b3d #blender3d #tutorial #3danimation #3d #cgi #productvisualization
